mip.description: ISMIP6 repeats selected DECK experiments with coupled AOGCM-ISM (where the ice sheet is an interactive component of the AOGCM) and standalone ISM (where the ice sheet model is driven offline by output from either an uncoupled AOGCM or from a standard ISMIP6 dataset).
mip.keywords: ice sheets, greenland, antarctica, sea level
mip.long_name: Ice Sheet Model Intercomparison Project for CMIP6
mip.label: ISMIP6
mip.rationale: Improving confidence in projections of the sea level rise associated with mass loss from the ice sheets of Greenland and Antarctica.

1pctCO2to4x-withism.description:
Increase atmospheric carbon dioxide by 1% per year to quadrupling then hold fixed for 200 years in a model with interactive ice sheets. The experiment should be identical to the corresponding standard CMIP AOGCM experiment except for the treatment of ice sheets. 1pctCO2to4x-withism forcing differs from the 1% increase in CO2 experiment in that  after year 140 , when the CO2 levels = 4xCO2, the concentration of CO2 remains set to 4xCO2 for the remainder of the experiment
Run for a minimum of 350 years (500 years encouraged).
1pctCO2to4x-withism.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, 1% per yr CO2, quadrupled CO2, interactive ISM, interactive ice sheets
1pctCO2to4x-withism.long_name: Experiment with interactive ice sheets forced by 1 percent per year increase in CO2 to 4xCO2 (subsequently held fixed)
1pctCO2to4x-withism.rationale: For analysis of the coupled ice sheet-climate system.

piControl.description: A pre-inudsutrial control simulation with non-evolving pre-industrial conditions. Conditions chosen to be representative of the period prior to the onset of large-scale industrialization, with 1850 being the reference year.  The piControl starts after an initial climate spin-up, during which the climate begins to come into balance with the forcing. The recommended minimum length for the piControl is 500 years.
piControl.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK, Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), pre-industrial, reference, control, climate,
piControl.rationale: Control experiment against which perturbations are compared, it serves as a baseline for experiments that branch from it.  To allow us to determine unforced model variability.  The control experiment should be long enough to extend to the furthest point in time reached by the end of the perturbation experiments,  thus the control should allow us to subtract any residual, unforced drift from all perturbation simulations.

piControl-withism.description:
The pre-industrial control in a model with interactive ice sheet model.   The experiment should be identical to the corresponding standard CMIP AOGCM experiment except for the treatment of ice sheets.
The spin up may require the GCM and ISM to be asynchronously coupled until the system reches quasi-equilibrium.  
Once equilibrium is reached, run for multi-hundred years (500 years suggested).
piControl-withism.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, piControl,  interactive ISM, interactive ice sheets
piControl-withism.long_name: Pre-industrial control with interactive ice sheets
piControl-withism.rationale:
To produce a realistic non-drifting coupled state, and assess systematic model bias.     
To capture unforced natural variability.

ism-historical-std.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for the historical climate experiment. This is an abbreviated experiment for the historical period which begins from the present day control and ends in December 2014.
ism-historical-std.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 2, historical, CMIP6 historical, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-historical-std.long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM historical output

abrupt-4xCO2.description: Impose an instantaneous quadrupling of the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide, then hold fixed.
abrupt-4xCO2.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK, Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), 4xCO2, instantaneous quadrupling, climate sensitivity
abrupt-4xCO2.long_name: Abrupt quadrupling of the atmospheric concentration of carbon dioxide
abrupt-4xCO2.rationale: To evaluate the equilibrium climate sensitivity of the model and to diagnose the strength of various feedbacks.  To characterise the radiative forcing that arises from an increase in atmospheric CO2 as well as changes that arise indirectly due to the warming.

ism-pdControl-std.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for constant present day forcing.  Forcings are set to the end of the initialisation procedure, which ranges from 1990s to 2014.
ism-pdControl-std.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, present day forcing, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-pdControl-std.long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM pdControl output

ism-ssp585-std.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for the SSP5-85 climate forcing scenario.
ism-ssp585-std.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 2, SSP5-85 forcing, stand-alone ISM,  ice sheets only
ism-ssp585-std.long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM ssp585 output
ism-ssp585-std.rationale: For projections of 21st century sea level.

amip.description: An atmosphere only climate simulation using prescribed sea surface temperature and sea ice concentrations but with other conditions as in the Historical simulation.
amip.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK, Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), Atmosphere,  historical SST
amip.rationale: AMIP baseline simulation for model evaluation and variability.

ism-1pctCO2to4x-std.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for the idealised 1% per year atmospheric carbon dioxide increase to quadrupling and held fixed climate change experiment.
ism-1pctCO2to4x-std.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, 1% per yr CO2, quadrupled CO2, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-1pctCO2to4x-std.long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM 1pctCO2to4x output

ism-lig127k-std.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for the PMIP4 Last Interglacial experiment, lig124k.
ism-lig127k-std.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 3, last interglacial, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-lig127k-std.long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM last interglacial output
ism-lig127k-std.rationale: A period when sea level was higher than the present day by at least 4 meters.  To provide information on the tendency of the long term response of the current climate and ice sheet model.

ism-amip-std.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by ISMIP6 CMIP6 standard input for the DECK amip climate experiment.
ism-amip-std.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 3, amip, DECK amip, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-amip-std.long_name: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM AMIP output
ism-amip-std.rationale: To understand the well observed record of ice sheet changes.

historical.description:
Simulation of recent past (1850 to 2014). 
Impose changing conditions (consistent with observations). Should be initialised from a point early enough in the pre-industrial control run to ensure that the end of all the perturbed runs branching from the end of this historical run end before the end of the control.
historical.long_name: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
historical.rationale: Spans the period of extensive instrumental temperature measurements from 1850 to the present. Evaluate model performance against present climate and observed climate change.

ism-ssp585-self.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by a CMIP6 model with scenarioMIP SSP5-85 forcing.  The ice sheet model should be configured with the same settings as the ice sheet model in the ssp585-withism experiment and should use the same initial conditions.
ism-ssp585-self.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 2, SSP5-85 forcing, stand-alone ISM,  ice sheets only
ism-ssp585-self.long_name: Ice sheet model driven with SSP5-85 scenario forcing

1pctCO2-4xext.description: Branched from the 1pctCO2 simulation at year 140 and run with CO2 fixed at 4x pre-industrial concentration.
1pctCO2-4xext.rationale: For comparison with ISMIP6 ism-1pctCO2to4x-std experiment.

ism-1pctCO2to4x-self.description:
Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by a CMIP6 model with 1% per year atmospheric carbon dioxide increased to quadrupling then held fixed for 200 years.
Run for a minimum of 350 years (500 years encouraged).  The ice sheet model should be configured with the same settings as the ice sheet model in the ipctCO2to4x-withism experiment and should use the same initial conditions.
ism-1pctCO2to4x-self.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, 1% per yr CO2, quadrupled CO2, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-1pctCO2to4x-self.long_name: Ice sheet model driven with 1% per yr CO2 increase to quadrupling forcing

ssp585.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway with SSP5 socioeconomic conditions. Concentration-driven.
ssp585.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP8.5, future, High forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp585.long_name: update of RCP8.5 based on SSP5
ssp585.rationale: The scenario represents the high end of plausible future pathways. SSP5 is the only SSP with emissions high enough to produce the 8.5 W/m2 level of forcing in 2100.

1pctCO2.description: 1 percent per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling.
1pctCO2.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK,  Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), CO2 1 percent per year increase, 1pctCO2, quadrupling, climate sensitivity
1pctCO2.long_name: 1 percent per year increase in CO2
1pctCO2.rationale: Serves as a consistent and useful benchmark for analysing model transient climate response (TCR). The TCR takes into account the rate of ocean heat uptake which governs the pace of all time-evolving climate change. In Earth System Models (ESMs) that include explicit representation of the carbon cycle this experiment allows the calculation of the transient climate response to cumulative carbon emissions (TCRE) to be calculated.

ssp585-withism.description:
ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 forcing in a model with interactive ice sheets. 
The set up follows the set up for the standard ScenarioMIP SSP5-85, which may therefore first require the CMIP6 Historical simulation to be performed too with a coupled AOGCM-ISM setting.
ssp585-withism.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 2, SSP5-85 forcing, interactive ISM, interactive ice sheets
ssp585-withism.long_name: SSP5-85 scenario with interactive ice sheets

ism-piControl-self.description: Stand alone ice sheet model driven offline by a CMIP6 model with piControl forcing. The ice sheet model should be configured with the same settings as the ice sheet model in the piControl-withism experiment and should use the same initial conditions.
ism-piControl-self.keywords: ISMIP6, Tier 1, piControl, stand-alone ISM, ice sheets only
ism-piControl-self.long_name: Ice sheet model driven with pre-industrial forcing

4xCO2maintained.description: After a period of 1% per year increase in CO2 to 4xCO2, maintain CO2 concentrations at 4x pre-industrial concentrations until the end of the simulation.
4xCO2maintained.label: Maintain 4xCO2 concentration

AOGCMconfiguration.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
AOGCMconfiguration.label: AOGCM Configuration

AGCMConfiguration.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
AGCMConfiguration.label: AGCM Configuration

HistoricalLandUse.data_link: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)
HistoricalLandUse.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
HistoricalLandUse.label: Historical Land Use

HistoricalSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.label: Historical Solar Irradiance Forcing

piSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
piSolarIrradiance.description: Pre-Industrial solar forcing. The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes pre-industrial solar forcing (1850-1873 mean).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
piSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, pre-industrial, pi, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
piSolarIrradiance.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Irradiance Forcing

ISMIP61pctCO2to4xInput.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of an AOGCM 1pctCO2to4x (1 percent per year increase in CO2 to quadrupling CO2 and then held at quadruple levels) experiment.
ISMIP61pctCO2to4xInput.keywords: ISMIP6, ISMIP6-specified input, 1pctCO2to4x, 1 percent per year increase in CO2 to quadrupling
ISMIP61pctCO2to4xInput.label: ISMIP6-specified 1pctCO2to4x input

piSolarParticleForcing.description: Pre-Industrial solar particle forcing (1850-1873 mean). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
piSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Pre-Industrial, pi, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
piSolarParticleForcing.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Particle Forcing

HistoricalAerosolForcing.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
HistoricalAerosolForcing.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

165yrs1850-2014.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
165yrs1850-2014.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.description: Historical solar particle forcing (1850-2014). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Historical, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.label: Historical Solar Particle Forcing

amipSST.data_link: AMIP Sea Surface Temperature and Sea Ice Concentration Boundary Conditions
amipSST.description: Apply AMIP sea surface temperature boundary conditions derived from observational data.
amipSST.keywords: AMIP, Sea surface temperature, AMIP, climate, modelling, SST, prescribed
amipSST.label: AMIP SST

ISMIP6lig127kInput.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of a PMIP4 Last Interglacial experiment, lig127k.
ISMIP6lig127kInput.keywords: ISMIP6, ISMIP6-specified input, lig127k, last interglacial 127k
ISMIP6lig127kInput.label: ISMIP6-specified lig127k input

rcp85Forcing.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
rcp85Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
rcp85Forcing.label: RCP85 Forcing

ISMIP6ssp585Input.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of an AOGCM SSP5 RCP8.5 climate forcing scenario.
ISMIP6ssp585Input.keywords: ISMIP6, ISMIP6-specified input, SSP5 RCP8.5, SSP585
ISMIP6ssp585Input.label: ISMIP6-specified SSP585 input

PresentDayISMInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the ISMIP6 ism-pdControl-std stand alone ice sheet simulation
PresentDayISMInitialisation.label: Present Day ISM Initialisation

spinUpInitialisation.description: Initialisation after the system reaches quasi-equilibrium
spinUpInitialisation.label: Initialisation after spin-up

150yrs1850-1999.description: Begin in 1850 and run for 150 years.
150yrs1850-1999.label: 1850-1999 150yrs

ISMIP6pdControlInput.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of an AOGCM present day control experiment.
ISMIP6pdControlInput.keywords: ISMIP6, ISMIP6-specified input, present day control, pdControl
ISMIP6pdControlInput.label: ISMIP6-specified pdControl input

piForcingExcludingCO2solar.description: Pre-Industrial forcing excluding carbon dioxide (CO2) and solar forcing.
piForcingExcludingCO2solar.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2, excluding solar
piForcingExcludingCO2solar.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2 and Solar

piControlISMInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the pre-industrial control with interactive ice sheets
piControlISMInitialisation.label: PreIndustrialISMInitialisation

historicalISMInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of an historical simulation with interactive ice sheets
historicalISMInitialisation.label: HistoricalISMInitialisation

HistoricalInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
HistoricalInitialisation.label: HistoricalInitialisation

FutureSolarParticleForcing.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
FutureSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
FutureSolarParticleForcing.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

ISMIP6historicalInput.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of an AOGCM historical climate forcing.
ISMIP6historicalInput.label: ISMIP6-specified Historical input

PreIndustrialInitialisation.description: Initialisation from the pre-industrial control simulation.
PreIndustrialInitialisation.label: PreIndustrialInitialisation

AOGCM-ISMConfiguration.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model with interactive ice sheets
AOGCM-ISMConfiguration.keywords: AOGCM-ISM, ESM-ISM, Atmosphere-Ocean-IceSheet, Earth System, Model, Configuration
AOGCM-ISMConfiguration.label: AOGCM-ISM Configuration

HistoricalO3andStratosphericH2OConcentra.description: An ozone concentration database encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
HistoricalO3andStratosphericH2OConcentra.keywords: Historical, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
HistoricalO3andStratosphericH2OConcentra.label: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

86yrs2015-2100.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
86yrs2015-2100.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

HistoricalStratosphericAerosol.data_link: Stratospheric Aerosol Data Set (SADS Version 2) Prospectus
HistoricalStratosphericAerosol.description: Apply historical stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
HistoricalStratosphericAerosol.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

amipSIC.data_link: AMIP Sea Surface Temperature and Sea Ice Concentration Boundary Conditions
amipSIC.description: Apply AMIP sea ice boundary conditions derived from observational data.
amipSIC.keywords: AMIP, Sea Ice, climate, modelling, AMIP, ipcc, seaIce, prescribed
amipSIC.label: AMIP SIC

ISMIP6AMIPInput.description: ISMIP6-specified input from the output of an AGCM amip climate forcing.
ISMIP6AMIPInput.label: ISMIP6-specified AMIP input

HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

36yrs1979-2014.description: Historical, Recent past, since satellite observations have been available
36yrs1979-2014.label: 1979-2014 36yrs

Abrupt4XCO2.description: Impose an instantaneous quadrupling of atmospheric carbon dioxide concentration, then hold fixed.
Abrupt4XCO2.keywords: 4x, CO2, 4xCO2, instant, instantaneous, quadrupling, ipcc, climate, deck
Abrupt4XCO2.label: Abrupt 4xCO2 Increase

1%yrCO2Increase.description: Impose a 1% per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling.
1%yrCO2Increase.label: 1% per year CO2 Increase

100yrsAfterSpinUp.description: Run for at least 100 years after spin-up, for use with paleoclimate experiments.
100yrsAfterSpinUp.label: 100yrsAfterSpinUp

FutureSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
FutureSolarIrradiance.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
FutureSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
FutureSolarIrradiance.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

piForcingExcludingCO2.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
piForcingExcludingCO2.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2

AMIP Sea Surface Temperature and Sea Ice.description: Specification of the AMIP sea surface temperature and sea ice concentration boundary conditions for CMIP6
AMIP Sea Surface Temperature and Sea Ice.name: AMIP Sea Surface Temperature and Sea Ice Concentration Boundary Conditions

Historical greenhouse gas concentrations.description: Here, we provide consolidated data sets of historical atmospheric (volume) mixing ratios of 43 greenhouse gases specifically for the purpose of climate model runs.
Historical greenhouse gas concentrations.name: Historical greenhouse gas concentrations

SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMI.description: An overview of the CMIP6 solar forcing dataset (irradiance as well as particle-related parameters) and guidelines for their usage.
SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMI.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6

Stratospheric Aerosol Data Set (SADS Ver.name: Stratospheric Aerosol Data Set (SADS Version 2) Prospectus

Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land.description: A new set of global gridded land-use forcing datasets are being developed to link historical land-use data and future projections in a standard format required by climate models.
Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land.name: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)
